oracle.mapviewer.share
Class SizeDefinition

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.SizeDefinition
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SizeDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Class to represent an individual size with an associated unit. Sizes with unit can be used to define scalable styles, in which size varies as a map is zoomed in or zoomed out. The default size unit is screen pixels ("px" - it is not scalable). Undefined unit means screen pixel. Valid units are stored on Spatial units table.

See Also:

parse

public static SizeDefinition parse(java.lang.String valueWithunit)
Parses the input String value and returns a SizeDefinition object.

Parameters:
valueWithunit - value contains number plus unit (1px, 2.3m, ...). Null unit means pixel(px).
Returns:
SizeDefinition - null if input value cannot be parsed.

isPixelUnit

public boolean isPixelUnit()
Returns if size unit is to be treated as pixel. Null unit, or "px", or "pt" are handled as pixel units.

Returns:
